speaker: President. –
english: President. – Mr Martin, there were far too many one-minute speeches. Normally it lasts half an hour. It has overrun that by quite a lot, so I am sorry.
original: President. – Mr Martin, there were far too many one-minute speeches. Normally it lasts half an hour. It has overrun that by quite a lot, so I am sorry.
agenda_item: The role of sport in education (debate)
